metadata.description: Generate an image from just text! Uses the latest and greatest AI model.

metadata.label: Font Weight
metadata.description: Not all fonts have all weights, regular is the default.

DALL-E 3 is an advanced text-to-image AI developed by OpenAI that offers improved accuracy and nuance in translating ideas into images, compared to its predecessors. It's designed for easy integration with ChatGPT, allowing for collaborative prompt refinement and generation of images that closely adhere to provided text descriptions. This technology is particularly useful for creators seeking to materialize their concepts into precise visual representations without the need for prompt engineering or extensive revisions.

metadata.defaultValue: A painting of a cat sitting on a chair
